45#ifndef __sockpp_acceptor_h
46#define __sockpp_acceptor_h
47
48#include "sockpp/inet_address.h"
49#include "sockpp/stream_socket.h"
50
51namespace sockpp {
52
54
63class acceptor : public socket
64{
66 using base = socket;
67
68 // Non-copyable
69 acceptor(const acceptor&) = delete;
70 acceptor& operator=(const acceptor&) = delete;
71
72protected:
82 static result<socket_t> create_handle(int domain) {
83 return stream_socket::create_handle(domain);
84 }
85
86public:
88 static constexpr int DFLT_QUE_SIZE = 4;
89
90#if defined(_WIN32) || defined(__CYGWIN__)
91 static constexpr int REUSE = SO_REUSEADDR;
92#else
93 static constexpr int REUSE = SO_REUSEPORT;
94#endif
95
99 acceptor() noexcept {}
105 explicit acceptor(socket_t handle) noexcept : base(handle) {}
116 acceptor(const sock_address& addr, int queSize = DFLT_QUE_SIZE, int reuse = 0) {
117 if (auto res = open(addr, queSize, reuse); !res)
118 throw std::system_error{res.error()};
119 }
127 acceptor(const sock_address& addr, int queSize, error_code& ec) noexcept {
128 ec = open(addr, queSize).error();
129 }
135 acceptor(acceptor&& acc) noexcept : base(std::move(acc)) {}
143 static result<acceptor> create(int domain) noexcept;
149 acceptor& operator=(acceptor&& rhs) {
150 base::operator=(std::move(rhs));
151 return *this;
152 }
158 result<> listen(int queSize = DFLT_QUE_SIZE) {
159 return check_res_none(::listen(handle(), queSize));
160 }
171 result<> open(
172 const sock_address& addr, int queSize = DFLT_QUE_SIZE, int reuse = 0
173 ) noexcept;
180 result<stream_socket> accept(sock_address* clientAddr = nullptr) noexcept;
181};
182
184
193template <typename STREAM_SOCK, typename ADDR = typename STREAM_SOCK::addr_t>
194class acceptor_tmpl : public acceptor
195{
197 using base = acceptor;
198
199 // Non-copyable
200 acceptor_tmpl(const acceptor_tmpl&) = delete;
201 acceptor_tmpl& operator=(const acceptor_tmpl&) = delete;
202
203public:
205 using stream_sock_t = STREAM_SOCK;
207 using addr_t = ADDR;
208
212 acceptor_tmpl() noexcept {}
219 acceptor_tmpl(const addr_t& addr, int queSize = DFLT_QUE_SIZE, int reuse = 0) {
220 if (auto res = open(addr, queSize, reuse); !res)
221 throw std::system_error{res.error()};
222 }
229 acceptor_tmpl(const addr_t& addr, int queSize, error_code& ec) noexcept {
230 ec = open(addr, queSize).error();
231 }
240 acceptor_tmpl(in_port_t port, int queSize = DFLT_QUE_SIZE) {
241 if (auto res = open(port, queSize); !res)
242 throw std::system_error{res.error()};
243 }
252 acceptor_tmpl(in_port_t port, int queSize, error_code& ec) noexcept {
253 ec = open(port, queSize).error();
254 }
260 acceptor_tmpl(acceptor_tmpl&& acc) noexcept : base(std::move(acc)) {}
267 static result<acceptor_tmpl> create() { return base::create(addr_t::ADDRESS_FAMILY); }
273 acceptor_tmpl& operator=(acceptor_tmpl&& rhs) {
274 base::operator=(std::move(rhs));
275 return *this;
276 }
281 addr_t address() const { return addr_t(base::address()); }
287 result<> bind(const addr_t& addr) { return base::bind(addr); }
298 result<> open(const addr_t& addr, int queSize = DFLT_QUE_SIZE, int reuse = 0) noexcept {
299 return base::open(addr, queSize, reuse);
300 }
311 result<> open(in_port_t port, int queSize = DFLT_QUE_SIZE, int reuse = 0) noexcept {
312 return open(addr_t(port), queSize, reuse);
313 }
320 result<stream_sock_t> accept(addr_t* clientAddr = nullptr) {
321 if (auto res = base::accept(clientAddr); res)
322 return stream_sock_t{res.release()};
323 else
324 return res.error();
325 }
326};
327
329} // namespace sockpp
330
331#endif // __sockpp_acceptor_h
